summary: The Doctor is baffled when a young woman is transported to the TARDIS on her wedding day, and attempts to find out how she is connected to an alien plot to destroy Earth.
cast: David Tennant|Catherine Tate|Sarah Parish|Don Gilet|Howard Attfield|Jacqueline King|Trevor Michael Georges|Glen Wilson|Krystal Archer|Rhodri Meilir|Zafirah Boateng|Paul Kasey|Billie Piper|Richard Price
keywords: tenth doctor|runaway bride|evil santa|giant spiderweb|giant spider
title: The Runaway Bride
